name: application_exit
description: This function is used to close a specified application on a smart home device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device which needs to be closed is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device which needs to be closed is located.  e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device on which the application needs to be closed. e.g. TV, fridge, mobile, etc.

parameters.name: appname
parameters.description: The name of the application to be closed. e.g. Netflix, prime video, etc.
